name: Flammarion
notes: Corporate world (Ling-Standard Products). Excellent starport with shipyard. Naval and Scout bases on moon.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Primary

stellarInfo.description: A yellow-white main sequence dwarf, slightly hotter and more massive than Sol.

celestialObjects.gmNotes: F8 V white main sequence. Mass 1.18 Sol.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Medium world, very thin tainted atmosphere. Pop 700,000. Corporate gov (LSP). TL11.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Highport
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Class A Excellent starport. Full shipyard facilities. 9,575 port employees.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Moon
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Large moon hosting Imperial Naval Base and Scout/X-Boat station.

celestialObjects.name: Naval Base Flammarion
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Imperial Naval Base. Patrol and system defense operations. RESTRICTED.

celestialObjects.name: Scout Base
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Imperial Scout Service base. X-Boat link to greater Imperium.

celestialObjects.name: Flammarion Belt
celestialObjects.gmNotes: Main planetoid belt. Mining operations by LSP subsidiaries.

roleContent.captain: CAUTION: Naval base presence. Imperial jurisdiction - Garoovian claims may not hold, but stay alert.
roleContent.astrogator: Destination reached. No gas giants for skimming - plan fuel purchases. Good X-boat links.
roleContent.pilot: Class A port - full facilities. Very thin tainted atmosphere on surface. Use orbital approach.
roleContent.engineer: Excellent shipyard for repairs and upgrades. Refined fuel available. Schedule maintenance.
roleContent.sensors: Heavy traffic near port. Naval patrols active. Maintain proper transponder.
roleContent.gunner: DO NOT engage near Naval Base. Imperial space - weapons must be safed on approach.
roleContent.medic: Full medical facilities available. Restock supplies here.
roleContent.steward: LSP corporate world - business travelers common. Upgrade passenger amenities.
roleContent.cargo: Industrial imports from LSP. Belt mining exports. Good trade opportunities.

news.headline: LSP QUARTERLY PROFITS EXCEED EXPECTATIONS
news.content: Ling-Standard Products reports 8% revenue growth. Belt mining operations credited with strong performance.

news.headline: NAVAL BASE EXERCISES SCHEDULED
news.content: System defense exercises planned for Days 145-152. Commercial traffic may experience minor delays.

news.headline: NEW X-BOAT ROUTE ANNOUNCED
news.content: Enhanced X-boat service to Sword Worlds border. Message transit times reduced by 40%.

news.headline: BOUNTY HUNTERS DETAINED AT PORT
news.content: Two individuals carrying non-Imperial bounty warrants detained by port security. Reminder: Imperial law supersedes foreign claims.

captain.subject: Welcome & Advisory
captain.content: Welcome to Flammarion. Note: Non-Imperial bounty claims have no legal standing here. However, we recommend discretion. Safe travels.

astrogator.subject: Route Options
astrogator.content: From Flammarion: Multiple routes available spinward. Consider Bowman (J-2) or continue to District 268. Updated charts attached.

engineer.subject: Maintenance Special
engineer.content: 20% discount on annual maintenance for ships over 500 tons. Class A facilities available. Book now for priority scheduling.

steward.subject: Market Opportunity
steward.content: High demand for transport to Regina cluster. Business class passengers willing to pay premium rates.

medic.subject: Services Available
medic.content: Full medical facilities. Bio-scanner calibration, cryo-revival certification, and emergency care. 24-hour availability.
